Hero.name: My name is
Hero.slogan: I build things for the web.
Hero.summary: I'm a frontend developer that enjoys the process of writing high-standard code. I find the challenge of problem-solving fun and rewarding. It motivates me to see a project come together and perform its purpose perfectly.

About.p1: Hello! My name is Junior and I enjoy building cool stuff for the web. Since I was fourteen, I've been interested in web development when using HTML & CSS felt like magic!
About.p2: To become the developer I wanted to be, I enrolled in the Institute Of Technology Of the Americas (ITLA) for a degree in Software Development.
About.p3: After that, I had the chance to work with multiple companies while being a freelancer.
About.p4: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

Experience.title: Where I've Worked
Experience.FrontEndDevDes: Worked with a team of other developers and designers and a project manager to create modern web apps for clients. Developed the core features of the apps, refined code, and improved processes, producing smoother operations and enhancing user engagement.
Experience.BackEndTeacherDes: Taught two web development classes ( Backend Development with PHP and SQL and Web Development with ASP.net). I planned the class schedule, homework and final project and graded the students.
Experience.WebMasterDes: Monitored website functionality across leading web browsers and mobile applications, and ensured compatibility with major operating systems. Researched market trends to keep up with best practices in SEO, social media promotion, search analytics, and web hosting.

Work.title: Some Things I’ve Built
Work.GenteUniDes: A fully developed social network targeted at college students in Latin America, the web app includes a fully complete posting, following, and commenting system. With multiple other features such as school ranking, social login, and job posting
Work.BookHubDes: BookHub is a simple and minimalist app to keep track of the books you read. The app is built as a PWA and then converted into an android app. The app is available to download on Google Play.
Work.HOHDes: A web app to track houses built by an NGO called Homes of Hope, helps them to keep track of where houses are built so they can come back and follow up with the families.

OtherWork.title: Other Projects
OtherWork.BaseballDes: A baseball simulation engine built using PHP.
OtherWork.QuizAppDes: A quiz app that can receive an array of questions and validate the answers.
OtherWork.NodeApiDes: A Node.js api for a social app with endpoints for posting, adding friends, commenting, chatting and more.
OtherWork.WeddingRegistryDes: Wedding Registry built with Next.js that connect to a Google Sheet that can be edited to update the items in the list.

Contact.title: What Now?
Contact.text: I’m always looking for new opportunities so my inbox is always open. Even if you just have a question or just want to say hi, go ahead. I’ll make sure to get back to you!

NoFound.header: Oh no! You broke the internet!
NoFound.text: We couldn't find what you're looking for. Try using the navigation bar.

common.built: Built by Junior Batista, Designed by Brittany Chiang.
